title: Scripting in low Diamond
body:
** A POST SIMILAR TO THIS WAS TAKEN DOWN, WHICH MEANS THAT A RIOT STAFF MEMBER SAW IT AND TOOK NO ACTION AS THE EXACT SAME THING HAPPENED TODAY **

I submit these posts hoping something will happen, only to have the same copy-pasted response about using the in game report feature. Well I have been and NOTHING HAS BEEN DONE.

There is a player with the summoner name "TSM Ezreal" on the OCE server who is using scripts on Kog'Maw. He goes around in his 4/5 man dynamic queue with the same people and continues to use scripts, ruining the game.

I'm sure RIOT  has their own ways of dealing with this in terms of checking whether he is or not so I'm not going to bother with video proof which people can debate. This is because I'm so confident that if RIOT takes 5 minutes to look into this player they will be able to tell he is scripting.

 Can something PLEASE be done about this so that I don't have more games of running into this same guy (its OCE at diamond level, so you see a lot of the same people).

Or is using third party software which controls the movement of your character allowed now? If so, I didn't get the memo.



Sincerely 
A salty member of the OCE community.

replies.body: You mean doing something that effectively breaks the rules of the forums causing your thread to be taken down is a sign of action not being taken against rule breaking?{{summoner:4}}

> A POST SIMILAR TO THIS WAS TAKEN DOWN, WHICH MEANS THAT A RIOT STAFF MEMBER SAW IT AND TOOK NO ACTION AS THE EXACT SAME THING HAPPENED TODAY

The post was taken down because there is a no name and shame policy on the boards, and as I believe was mentioned on the original post, support is a better place to take that information. The thread was given an appropriate answer and then taken down for violating the rules.

The mods that govern the boards are completely separate from the people that deal with the actual game.

Hey, I just want to add on a bit:

+ I can assure you **Riot** knows about this guy. **Riot Maraudaur** apparently played a game with him recently, and Wrenchmen **Wuks** encountered him in a [ranked game](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/131082366/200975387).

+ Considering that it's been a while now, it might be possible that he's not actually scripting. There's a [korean attack-move](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hBwrGdUxr90) technique being used that looks like scripting on **Kog'Maw**, but it's actually 100% legal.

Thanks for keeping **Riot** pressed on the issues though, I hope we sort this out soon :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hBwrGdUxr90

Obviously its up to you to decide whether or not hes scripting but if the same result can be reproduced this way...

Post a link to a replay file, or it didn't happen.

Basically give the proper evidence so your not wasting anyone's time with salty testimonies.
They had a vid in a previous thread.
What princess Yaia said. Also RIOT isnt going to use some playsTV clip to check, they have their ways. its up to them, not the opinion of people on the boards.
A Replay File like one from Lol Replay or LSI, not a youtube vid dumbass.

> NOTHING HAS BEEN DONE.

I'm not seeing any tangible evidence to support this. Last I checked, a list of players who have been punished (or are in the process of being punished) *isn't* available publically, so I have no idea where you're getting the idea something *isn't* being done for the sole(?) reason that your previous thread was removed.
